title: Hollywood Hits & Flops 2023
content:
Now that the summer blockbuster season has wrapped, we’ve updated our interactive visualisation of Hollywood’s biggest box office hits and flops.

Just how well are Barbie and Oppenheimer are doing so far?
(Hint: very).

» Have a look at the visualisation to find out.

» See the raw data

Check out our other Tinseltown viz, What is the Most Successful Hollywood Movie of All Time? 

Both made with our dataviz software VizSweet.
author: Darina
